mapper.insert: insert into rb_comment(id, content, op_time, from_name, parent_id, to_name, article_id, headimg) values (#{id}, #{content},#{op_time}, #{from_name}, #{parent_id}, #{to_name}, #{article_id}, #{headimg});
mapper.select: select id, op_time,content,from_name,to_name,parent_id,article_id,headimg,sub_id, sub_op_time,sub_content,sub_from_name,sub_to_name,sub_parent_id,sub_article_id,sub_headimg from (select c.id id,c.op_time,c.content,c.from_name,c.to_name, c.parent_id, c.article_id,c.headimg,c1.id sub_id, c1.op_time sub_op_time,c1.content sub_content,c1.from_name sub_from_name,c1.to_name sub_to_name, c1.parent_id sub_parent_id, c1.article_id sub_article_id,c1.headimg sub_headimg from rb_comment c LEFT OUTER JOIN rb_comment c1 on c.id=c1.parent_id) c where c.parent_id='-1' and c.article_id=#{article_id} order by id desc
